title: Huge Problems with UI scaling while playing LoL in 4K please help
body:
Hi guys I just bought my brand new 4K samsung monitor because I wanted to play LoL with better graphics however using 4K resolution makes this game worse the UI is really tiny and bad it doesn't scale.

Is there any fix? and if not why is it Riot a 3 billion dollar company has not implemented 4K UI scaling in this game?

replies.body: 4K isn't fully supported right now, so you can run into issues.  Your best bet would be to scale down, and make sure not to exceed 1920x1080.  You should still be able to play this way.  If that doesn't work, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help directly towards finding some options!

I realize that this is from months ago but lemme tell you something about this game in 4k, It is absolutely beautiful. Now this is the issues we have ^^^^^^^ and honestly I don't understand why there still isn't a fix. With this new update on the PBE aswell it looks 10 times more horrible. The health bar finally scales, but the level you are doesn't, and neither does the "notches" in your health bar. Now sure yeah us 4k users could scale down to 1080p, but I hope everyone here realizes that scaling down to 1080p on a 4k monitor looks entirely like shit. I feel like I'm using a VHS. All we want is the scaling on the hud. The graphics are PERFECT! I fell in love with the detail immediately, but the scaling of the health bars and what not is not a hard task for such a huge company to adjust. I have no doubt they could do it in less the a week honestly. But all in all, only reason I'm commenting is because you said to scale back down to 1080p, Fuck that. I didn't spend nearly $1000's worth on skins for riot not to do one small little patch to progress into the 4k future. More and more people are going to 4k and I hope all riot members realize that. Have a good day fellas

Hi it plays fine in 1080p which is what I am using right now but this sort of defeats the whole purpose of me buying a 4K monitor.

However it looks better in 4K it looks picture perfect. But the UI scaling is so bad, in DOTA 2 they released a patch to support 4K resolution, most games I know off even ones from small indie companies offer support for 4K Resolution.

I cannot understand how it is that Riot a 3 billion dollar company the biggest game developer in the world has yet to release 4K support. 

Do you have an ETA on when you guys can roll out a 4K patch? 

Will we have official 4K Textures aswell? meaning like are you guys planning on re texturing the map etc with new 4K textures to take advantage of modern monitors? 4K is becoming the new standard, and LoL just doesn't seem to be keeping up with the modern era which makes me sad because even basic modern graphic technology is not supported in LoL the Engine is just soo old now and everybody has a modern PC these days :(
I also think the champions look smaller aswell the scaling is not good guys please don't tell me I wasted $450 USD on this monitor I bought it just for league please guys how do I fix this :(
